chapter.text: You keep walking anyway.^1500 Eventually you’ll get somewhere.^1500 As you walk you look around.^1500 You can’t figure out where you are.^1500 You don’t remember the halls being this long.^1500 As your thoughts begin to spiral you suddenly trip over something in front of you, landing face first on the ground.^1500 You rub your eyes and look up.^1500 Flinching at the light as your eyes adjust you look around.^1500 You’re back in the hall outside your classroom.
